entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 34. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
